name: Tasty Ground Turkey Tacos
author: Andrea Parker
summary: My mom's beef tacos get a makeover with ground turkey. These are much healthier, easier, and faster because there is no grease to contend with and I think they just taste better.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
1 cup shredded lettuce, or to taste
½ cup Cheddar cheese, or to taste
½ cup diced tomatoes, or to taste
¼ cup chopped green onion, or to taste
¼ cup chopped cilantro, or to taste
2 tablespoons sliced olives, or to taste
directions: Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add turkey; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes
Add tomato sauce, water, green chile peppers, onion,  , and garlic; simmer, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 30 minutes
Top with lettuce, Cheddar cheese, tomatoes, green onion, cilantro, and sliced olives
